Com_Talk_02d: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Sarqso... I bet my grandkid will like this.
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It really is nice to be back out under
the sun again. This view is what makes
Gerudo Town so special.
And there should be more customers too.
Now's the time to really go all out!

I heard the new big thing is attaching all
kinds of stuff to arrows before you shoot
them, so I've really stocked up.
You don't see a shop this hip very often,
am I right?

I've realized I need to be more accepting
of change.<sp:5:1:0> And that includes accepting
voe like you!
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Sad>Now that I think about it, I don't see
Makure anywhere...<sp:5:0:0> She's supposed to
be helping me run the shop.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I wonder if she's gone off with Kalani and
is eavesdropping on "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"<clr:0000> in
the shelter<clr:ffff> again...
talk0014: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sigh>If you want to buy more, get on with it.
Com_Talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0000>How many do you want to sell?
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Listen, little voeâ€”you can't buy what
you can't pay for, no matter how special
you are.
Com_Talk_05c:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The sooner you pick something, the
sooner you can sell it...
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Sarqso... I'll be sure to restock them
for you.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal>Look at all this stuff you've already got
packed in your pouch.<sp:5:0:0> Make some space
before you buy anything.
Com_Talk_05d: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Have anything else you want to sell me?
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It really is nice to be back out under
the moon again. This view is what makes
Gerudo Town so special.
And there should be more customers too.
Now's the time to really go all out!

I heard the new big thing is attaching all
kinds of stuff to arrows before you shoot
them, so I've really stocked up.
You don't see a shop this hip very often,
am I right?

I've realized I need to be more accepting
of change.<sp:5:1:0> And that includes accepting
voe like you!
Com_Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Sad>What is... I can't buy that from you.
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I hate not being able to see the moon.
I'm ready to say sav'orq to this place.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I am not going to literally buy something
off you. Remove it, then we can talk.
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you surprised to see such a hip shop
being run by someone my age?

I heard the new big thing is attaching
all kinds of stuff to arrows before you
shoot them...
As a merchant, I've got to embrace
the popular trends with open arms.<sp:5:1:0>
However...
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Under no circumstances will I introduce
a voe to my granddaughters!

Voe bring nothing but misfortune to
young Gerudo!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I hate not being able to see the sun.
I'm ready to say sav'orq to this place.
Com_Talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Well then... What do you want to sell?
GreetingAfter03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:CustomVasaaq>Vasaaq...


Given the choice between indoors and
outdoors, it's far better to test fire
arrows outside.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>What? I haven't had a chance to restock
any of my items yet.

That should be plenty obvious just from
looking at the display. Hang on...

<sp:3:0:2:0900>Are you here to meet my granddaughters?
Was I not clear before?

You may be the chief's guest, but a voe
is still bad luck to young Gerudo!
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you surprised to see such a hip shop
being run by someone my age?

I heard the new big thing is attaching all
kinds of stuff to arrows before you shoot
them, so I've really stocked up.
Change isn't so bad, I guess.<sp:5:1:0> Maybe
I should be more accepting of voe too.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>What? I haven't had a chance to restock
any of my items yet.

That should be plenty obvious just from
looking at the display. Hang on...

<sp:3:0:2:0900>Are you here to meet my granddaughters?
Was I not clear before?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hmph. After all you did for us, I suppose
I shouldn't be so harsh...
GreetingBefore03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:CustomVasaaq>Vasaaq...


I sell arrows, and I sell Chuchu jelly.
What do you think? A pretty sensible
combination, right?
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>What? Are you looking for a handout
or something?
Com_Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad>You're pretty indecisive for a voe who's
gotten special permission to be here...
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We Gerudo are open-minded enough
to honor our traditions while still being
accepting of new trends.
You clearly aren't a voe with a storm
cloud of misfortune following him around.
You can speak with my grandkids.
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Sad>Hm. <sp:5:0:0>Makure is supposed to be helping
me run the shop.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>She better not be planning to eavesdrop
on "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>" again...
